page.title: 09A typical day of Mr.Wilson
page.content: My Dad is an insurance agent.His office is at Barrow but his customers live in the Coniston to Ulverston area.He gets up in the morning and has a cup of tea .Then he gets dressed .He goes down stairs to get the post if there is any.Before he goes to work he spends about an hour on paper work. People sometimes phone him in the morning to see if he can come round to give them advice about insurance.He starts his round of his costomers at about 10.30am.His work involves going to people's houses to give out life insurance and other insurances.He comes home at dinner time and then goes back to work.When he gets home at tea time he has his tea and watches T.V. Sometimes he goes to the pub to play snooker at about 9.00 pm and gets back at 10.30pm and watches a film and then goes to bed.
